name: Palette Town
description:
Palette Town If Splatoon Met Mario...

You are a citizen in a dystopia where the government has sucked the colors from nature. Use the meager colors you have to defeat enemies as you journey to the city to defeat the government. 

In this 2D combat puzzle platformer, the player utilizes colors as powers to get to the next level. The primary colors will be colors that the player can shoot at enemies or at the environment.  The secondary colors will give the player 3 new powers that can only be used on the player as an ability. There will be combat with enemies who shoot black paint to disturb you. 

SHOOT:SELF CAST:ENEMIES:BounceDestroyStickJump higher
Heal
Invisible Hurts you

Game created by: 

        Jason Lum, Celine Tang, Alyssa Lo, Vincent Neang
